text:
I'm Drue Gilbert (they/them): maker, full stack web developer, educator, and proud queer nerd.
Welcome to my portfolio, a place to showcase some of my personal projects and do a little creative coding.

Hackbright Academy, Remote | 2021 - 2024
- Led cohorts of aspiring developers, delivering comprehensive training in full-stack development.
- Created and maintained curriculum content, focusing on real-world applications and industry best practices.
- Mentored students, fostering their growth from novices to job-ready software engineers.
tech: Python, Flask, PostgreSQL, SQLAlchemy, JavaScript, React, AWS, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap

text:
Remote | 2020 - 2021
- Developed and maintained internal tools, web portals, and data visualizations.
- Collaborated with clients to design and implement custom solutions for rapid deployment.
tech: Python, SQL, JavaScript, D3/Plot, HTML, CSS, Shell Script

text:
Coding Dojo, Oakland CA | 2019
- Provided personalized guidance to students, helping them overcome coding challenges.
- Assisted in the development and delivery of coding bootcamp materials, enhancing student engagement and learning outcomes.
tech: Python, Flask, Django, Java, Spring Boot, JavaScript, Express, Angular, MySQL, MongoDB, Mongoose, AWS, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap
